page.title: 01Introduction to Leighfield
page.content: The area covered by this block is known as Leighfield. The majority of the block lies within the old County of Rutland(now Leicestershire) and lies to the north of the A47 Leicester to Peterborough road. To the northeast lies Rutland Water and Oakham. The county boundary runs from north to south through the west of the block. The River Chater bisects the block running from west to east through the valley. No villages lie within the block. The area is given over almost totally to farming and the few houses within the area are the homes of farmers or are now deserted. The block has a very poor road supply most of the farms are only accessible via single track roads.
